name: Wavy Annihilation
description:
Puzzle game that is based on random effects and tactic. Click on a bubble and unleash a wave of destruction among the other bubbles. Get as many of them as you can! Only 7 tutorials levels for now

Jam Site: Антикафе GeekTime

Jam year:  2017

Platforms:  MS Windows, Mac OS X, Linux / Unix, Android device, iPhone, iPad

Technology Notes:  Govnocoded on Godot. Painted with in Krita. Music and SFX - paid assets .

Installation Instructions: 

Win: run Linux: allow run. Run

Mac: Extract .7z. Run. Only 10.11 or higer

All executables on gdrive. Newest versions here
